name: FamilyReunion
tag_list: family-reunions, reunions, gatherings, events, parent, grandparent, children, genealogy, family-history, ancestry, ancestors, kin, heritage
overview:
FamilyReunion LLC, the world’s largest social network for families, was established July 1995 in Hollywood, California by veteran film and television producer and internet entrepreneur Craig Richards.

FamilyReunion.com provides exclusive information, services, products, resources and links all designed to help millions of visitors and members connect with other family members and get the most from their family gathering events. It provides a free Resource Guide in which reunion organizers can find providers of relevant information, products and services.

The member search feature is also a very popular tool to help find missing branches of extended families who may have posted a reunion announcement or other member information in the database. Basic access to services at FamilyReunion.com is free while premium content and services are provided to platinum members for a fee.

FamilyReunion LLC, now headquartered in the Pacific Northwest region of the United States, remains under management of Craig Richards LLC.
